name: Halloween Candies Hack&Slash
description:
• FIREBALLS!
  • One quest that CAN be completed (just find the right way).
  • Achievement System... kind of...
  • Absurd, 96.5% linear story.
  • Combat based on simple physics.
  • Realtime shadows.
  • Full voice-over done by AI.
  • Day to night transition.
  • Still under development.

As it's one of my first steps in game developing, I will welcome all the commentaries and critic. If you will enjoy it, I will consider building the whole thing.

If you REALLY like it, you can throw me a buck or two to motivate me :)

I aim to have a version with actual dungeon and more content ready by Halloween 2019, so look out for next updates.
